website_summaries.verdict: Great source of personal cooling in situations where air conditioning is non-existent. Popular among outdoor concert-goers, landscapers, and others who spend time in the heat.
pros: Long battery life, with a USB charger
cons: Fan is powerful, but mister is variable

customer_reviews.title: It Saved My Life!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan for a trip to Orlando, Florida this past June 2018. I’m slightly heat intolerant and therefore needed something to help keep me cool. I fully charged the fan about a week before the trip. On the 3rd day of the trip is when I first used it when we went to Universal Studios. It was definitely a lifesaver. Without it I would have been totally miserable. It has different speeds and a water option of which I didn’t use. It’s slightly bulky but for what it was worth to me I didn’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Candidly Cristal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little mister hand fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great little misting fan. The quality seems excellent and the Mist that comes out is very atomized. Has multiple speeds, two different misting settings, rechargeable via USB, and the battery lasts a long long time. The only minor criticism I can think of is I wish the water reservoir held a little more. If you're using constant misting it only lasts under an hour. Oh yeah I forgot the other minor criticism is the size of the opening to refill the water. It would be nice if it were a bit larger. These are both minor annoyances and not enough to take it down in rating.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Spa-like fan
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased an, and was very impressed with the quietness, power, and low profile. This model is no different! Powerful cooling fan, fits easily in a purse or computer bag. The mist is SO NICE! It's not like the "Mister Bottles"- literally squirting water in your face. This is more like a spa- a gentle vapor blowing on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: This takes the cake
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fan. I get overheated so much, and this fan does the trick. I love that the mist comes out and cools you off. It's a small mist, you don't get wet, but it makes you feel like you have your own personal air conditioner. I have used it so much since I bought it and I haven't had to charge it yet.
customer_reviews.author: J Dub U

customer_reviews.title: Beats the heat!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is amazing. I have real problems with the heat, and this does definitely help. My only complaint is the water misting feature doesn't last long before you have to refill it (about 10 min). That's kinda annoying. Other than that, it does keep your face cool!
customer_reviews.author: lynda

customer_reviews.title: Two fans both arrived previously used!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first black mini hand held mister fan a week ago and the product came used. There was water in the reservoir and the protective plastic covering that should have been on the non-slip rubber feet had already been removed from the previous buyer. I tried it again the next day to order another one hoping it would be a new unit but the 2nd unit was also previously used when I received it. Very disappointed! I'm returnung both fans and will not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Cons is the stopper is designed like that on a old style water gun so not confident about the durability of this part. Also when in the car the slightest breeze redirects the mist stream. The reason I gave it 5 stars is cuz I bought it to use it in the car so I should of anticipated the problem. I positioned nearer my face problem solved. For the low price it's very light very portable very quiet it changed my life.....kidding honestly 5 star product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: migs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot days!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this mister! I live in Texas now and moved from Washington state, so it will take a while to acclimate to the heat. Pros: Very powerful fan and a mister. Pretty quiet to run surprisingly because the fan is powerful. Easy to refill on the go with the included container. Great rechargeable battery. Comfortable to hold. Cons: None yet. My inner Washingtonian loves this neat gadget!
customer_reviews.author: followyourbliss

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. It is so lightweight and portable. Not to mention that added water misting feature with the high-speed fan, you get an amazing breeze like one that comes from an air conditioner. Added bonus: it is usb rechargeable. With a full charge it can last more than 4 hours; note: I have not tested surpassing 4 hours; may last even longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: S&N

customer_reviews.title: Great simple fan
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed in this fan on our recent cruise. The ability to evaporate water with the separate water spray fan made all the difference The rechargeable battery lasts well and easy to refill the water reservoir with your water bottle
customer_reviews.author: Sally J

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: My little life saver. I am not going anywhere without this little fan. Specially in this hot days. It holds just enough water to cool down your face when you are really hot, even though you have to hold it very close to your face to feel a mist. Fan is very light and small to put it in your purse and carry it with you all the time
customer_reviews.author: N.T.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a cruise that stops in South America and Mexico and goes through the Panama Canel. The weather was so hot and humid. This fan worked great. I walked around with it as we saw the sites Everyone wanted to know where to buy one like it. It also great lounging around the pool between stops.It is rechargeable and never went out on me.
customer_reviews.author: GLORIA B.

customer_reviews.title: The mister is on the weak side
customer_reviews.text: The fan is pretty ok, The mister leaves a lot to be desired If you are more than 5-6 in from the fan you don't really get any effect of the mister. The mister shuts off by itself after a few minutes and the cover is very had to close. On the positive side it does not leak. The fan is quiet on low
customer_reviews.author: Fred S. Judkins II

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: I was going on a long trip to SC with my family for my son's baseball tournament. I knew it would be over 100 degrees while we were there so I bought this thinking it would be like a mini AC. It was amazing the first time I used it! It felt so good! Everyone asked me where I go it from. I took it to the hotel, plugged it in for the next day, took it back to the fields and, nothing. The thing wouldn't charge. It never did. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: momof5blessings

customer_reviews.title: I was super bummed because I thought I read good reviews
customer_reviews.text: The water hardly blows out. The fan isn't that strong. :( You don't feel the wind or the water very much... I was super bummed because I thought I read good reviews...
customer_reviews.author: PSL

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product saved my life for an outdoor summer concert. The misting is great but had to refill quite frequently. Had it on full blast for almost 3 hours and it still had charge!
customer_reviews.author: Inspector gadget

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan but Room for Improvement
customer_reviews.text: All though I love this fan there is room for improvement. The fan should blow harder, and that would help with the condensation from the mist. A different water bottle please. It's hard to fill the current bottle. I bought one for a friend and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne M Hall

customer_reviews.title: Water leaks everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan because I work outside all day at a marine park and I live in the south so it’s HOT. the fan is fine but The water compartment that you fill up to use the fan as a mister leaks. I filled it all the way up, used it for a couple minutes and when I came back to it maybe 10/15 minutes later all the water had leaked out all over the counter. The fan part works fine and if it held water and didn’t leak I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: jerome zoller

customer_reviews.title: Highly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Update 07/20/19 So I initially gave this product 2 stars because after 3 weeks the misting part stopped working. I reached out to the company and I was sent a replacement. The customer service was A+ and I was hoping I didnt have to make this review. Unfortunately the mister for the replacement also stopped working after 2 weeks so I think there is an actual problem with the product. Less than a month and the misting part stops working. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Shelly O

customer_reviews.title: This fan does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: I love my fan. The mist is just right. It doesn't leave your face wet but cools it off especially when you are not in the mood for a wet face, and you just want to cool off.
customer_reviews.author: Ke-Ke

customer_reviews.title: Super satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love this. No worries about dead batteries. Light weight and easy to transport. I took on a recent trip to Dubai where the heat is like nothing i have ever experienced. The ladies in my travel group took turns using it. We were all so thankful for the water mist! I would buy this item again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to cool off during our walks in the parks. Does a pretty good job. Only complaints are that the water is used to quickly, and the fan could be a little stronger. For what it is, definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon F. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A great little fan
customer_reviews.text: A great little fan. I suffer with night sweats and this has been a little life saver. It is very quiet which is almost a necessity for me. It has a nice mister and it feels nice in the hand. One thing that i wish were different. When on, it has red led lights that are pretty bright considering I use it a night. Fairly minor issue.. Wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: IRENE CRAFT

customer_reviews.title: Hot Flashes be gone!
customer_reviews.text: Someone recommended this for hot flashes. I thought it was kind of hokey but I was desperate so I bought it. It is literally saving my life right now. Replaces my urge to climb in a freezer and makes me feel so much better. If you are struggling with hot flashes, don’t hesitate. This works!
customer_reviews.author: E. Sisco

customer_reviews.title: Small, functional, effective!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, functional, effective fan. I have very long/thick hair and so I tend to overheat very quickly in higher temperatures (or if I'm excited lol). This fan is effective at cooling me off and preventing heatstroke. It's pretty quiet (but not silent of course) on the lower 2 levels, and you can hear humming on the highest level, which is normal. I only turn it on when I'm needing it, and so far I've only had to charge it once (owned for about 3 weeks). So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: itsallsaltwater

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, strong, nice mist!  Rechargeable!
customer_reviews.text: I have been having problems with dehydration in this intense summer heat. I ordered this after I got out my old portable fan/mister. The old fan was not delivering what I hoped it would. (Preventing heat exhaustion) Then I found thus Opolar fan! Not only does this fan have a rechargeable battery, it has three levels of fan power and a soft misting that is very soothing. It is easy to carry around and the water well is tightly plugged to prevent leakage. I will take it with me wherever I go along with my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn D. Kohler

customer_reviews.title: A little big but feels great in warm temperatures!
customer_reviews.text: A little big to fit in a small/standard purse. But fan feels great and the mist that it also provides separates it from other small fans. Good value for price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: AKzr06

customer_reviews.title: Small but really works!!
customer_reviews.text: This fan has saved me in the heat of the South!! I love the multiple speeds and that you can change the amount of spray. It’s way better than the other fans I’ve seen and smaller. Quiet. Battery life is awesome. No complaints!!
customer_reviews.author: JennH

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Use this at baseball games outdoors.. It give a very nice GENTLE mist without drenching me.. Got one also for a friend.. SHE LOVED it as well.. GREAT FIND>>
customer_reviews.author: GINNYJAY

customer_reviews.title: I'm confused at the positive reviews...
customer_reviews.text: This fan barely works at all. I'm not sure if mine was defective or if the reviews are fake. This fan emits the lightest amount of air. Similar to someone blowing air on you with your mouth. I would have returned it if I had opened and tried it in time. 0/10
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. This is the third one I’ve bought in as many years. I keep buying them for different locations. I have one in my room, one at my desk, and one that travels with me.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Did not work sent it back.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in an unsealed package looked like it was used,I charged it all night,but it would not work. Sent it back did not buy another one simply got a 97 cent little spray bottle which works great to cool me down.
customer_reviews.author: The Duke

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong! Less than $16/shipped to Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best portable misting fans on Amazon in my opinion! Wish the water tank was bigger. Yet it blows great an its rechargeable too! I baught one for my GF an she loves it! It blows like a mini a/c unit!
customer_reviews.author: Ferenc Csigi

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product that doesn't work right after charging.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new out of the box it doesn't even work. I charged it and the first time use, it didn't even turn on. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY FOLKS. YOU WILL GET A BROKEN FAN!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. R.C.

customer_reviews.title: This  Fan Keeps Me Rockin'
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this fan. I live in Florida and attend a lot of outdoor events in the summer. This fan is the perfect size to throw in my bag and take to outdoor concerts or just to the local bar to see my favorite band. I was really amazed that it wold work so well in the Florida heat.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to for my one year old daughter, she loves it. Was able to hold it, press the buttons herself. Kept her cool with the mist, during sporting events. Really great fan!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Great price and a great value
customer_reviews.text: It’s light weight, quiet, and a perfect fan. The mist is a superfine spray that ever so slightly mists, and does not soak you like some others.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Fairly useless
customer_reviews.text: This has to be just a few inches from your face to feel either the fan or the mist. And only for indoor use, because it is even less effective outdoors. And I dropped it in the sand once and the fan quit working.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is good. Noise level is very quiet! Little larger then I expected. Wish it was a little stronger but decent fan.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works a long time. The little water bottle supplied to fill the tank is useless. The mist adds a lot of cooling.
customer_reviews.author: CAL

customer_reviews.title: A favorite Amazon purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute must-have item if you like going on outdoor strolls or if you easily overheat. This is one of my favorite Amazon purchases
customer_reviews.author: hyhh

customer_reviews.title: Great little mister & fan
customer_reviews.text: Cap Broke off of water container first time used Will not stand up must hold it the entire time
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like them but unfortunately the fan is weak as is the spray. In the Florida heat you need something more than this wimpy puff of air. Walmart has better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A. Eberly

customer_reviews.title: This is great for hot days
customer_reviews.text: This is great for hot days. My kids love it. Easy to use and charge and provides a cool mist which really helps at baseball games!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dudek

customer_reviews.title: This fan may be small, but it's mighty!
customer_reviews.text: This handy dandy little fan sits on my bike during spin class and helps to keep my face and hair from becoming drenched with sweat! Sorry, but that's the long and short of it. For me, this was its purpose, and thus far, it's doing its job!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Klovee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy This!
customer_reviews.text: This broke the first time I used it. The cord looked like an Apple charger. I plug it in, it charged and then unplug it and the connector broke off right in the slot. Terrible quality metal. Don’t buy this, spend a bit more for a different brand. They did take it back and return my payment.
customer_reviews.author: jane m antonacci

customer_reviews.title: Where's the mist?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan, hoping it would be a relief at the beach, with the option to fan and mist at the same time. Unfortunately, if you want to feel that fan or mist you have to put it on the highest settings for both and hold it within 6 inches of whatever you're fanning. I could barely feel the mist at all even on the highest setting. I wish this would have worked out because I was very excited about this purchase. I'm sad it didn't work as well as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: A/C in my hand!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! My wife and daughter use this all the time in Southeast Asia where they live. I will be buying many more for the rest of the family and myself! Thanks for an amazing product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthias B.

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for on the go hot days
customer_reviews.text: Love this misting fan! Perfect for hot days on the go! We use it on our daily walks
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: I even bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: Love using these for the theme parks. They’re small so I can easily pack them in my back as well as charge them although the battery lasts all day. Provides various speeds and even a mist option. Loved it so much I bought a second!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Works okay.
customer_reviews.text: I brought these to a music festival. The fan worked great but the mister wasn’t the best. Also the water ran out pretty quickly. I would still use them but bring extra water to fill them up.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper415

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan! Took a couple of these to Disney World they worked out great! Way better than the ones they sell there! Great little product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: no recommended
customer_reviews.text: did not work all the time, seems to run out of water fast
customer_reviews.author: Coach CJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for hot days playing sports
customer_reviews.text: Great fan! Works well. Great for summer sports. It kept them cool in between innings on a hot day.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time at an outdoor concert with temperature of 90 degrees and high humidity. Is it like air conditioning? No Does it cool you down? Yes. It works best when you use the mist with the fan. I was a lot more comfortable than those around me using paper fans. Many concert goers asked where I got this fan. It was comfortable to hold and fit easily in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: VLA

customer_reviews.title: This misting fan definitely cools. It is also well ...
customer_reviews.text: This misting fan definitely cools. It is also well made. I’d buy it again. The only thing I’d change is that the water well could be bigger to hold more water.
customer_reviews.author: kathy d

customer_reviews.title: Great if you’re just looking for a fan, not a mister.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why they ask about “warmth” for a fan, but... Just used the fan for the first time...the fan is great, the misting portion doesn’t do anything but fill up the hole in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate
customer_reviews.text: This fan is amazing right out of the box. I live in South Florida and I am kicking myself for not getting one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen m

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Amazing product for a football game in the bleachers
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Lyn Lee

customer_reviews.title: Handy gadgets
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy for keeping kids cool, while walking around .
customer_reviews.author: Brneyes

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: Not powerful and misting is inadequate. Not worth the high price!!!
customer_reviews.author: dee's opinion

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: It feels kinda cheap. The squeeze bottle to fill the water holder is basically useless as it's impossible to fill with a reasonable amount of water. The water holder on top of the fan leaks water when putting the cap on, which will likely end up breaking it when a leak finally hits the electronics. Otherwise, yes it works as intended, just expected more for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: brett storey

customer_reviews.title: Exact for hot days
customer_reviews.text: Wish it could the container be bigger to add water. And put a string to it, but there should be one and a better handle, so you won’t drop it. Over all, I love it. People asked about it and I recommended it for them
customer_reviews.author: Dana Ses

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. One of my best purchases. The charging port is the same as my samsung galaxy. I plan to buy a couple more for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works really great!
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied customers, more so every day as summer progresses. I'd but it again and strongly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: usually.all.smiles

customer_reviews.title: This product is made cheaply and I was very dissatisfied, it doesn't work uno
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work properly, it makes a loud noise, and it is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not much mist
customer_reviews.text: fan runs fine but water mist is nearly non existent, have to hold it against your face to feel moisture
customer_reviews.author: Trip

customer_reviews.title: Survived the hot weather because of this fan
customer_reviews.text: Must buy if you are in a hot environment...powerful and reliable...I recommend to everyone all the time
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: I love this misting fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this misting fan. It's a very sturdy and powerful fan and when you turn the mister function on it feels like a air conditioner. I'm going to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: D. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap build, charge port susceptible to breakage
customer_reviews.text: Micro USB charge port broke. Third fan of this type and build with similar issues. If the battery was removable it could be charged separately at the sacrifice of convenience. Do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lyman K

customer_reviews.title: Not a great item
customer_reviews.text: The well for the water is small, and the squeeze bottle that you fill it with didn’t open. When I finally did get some water in, it was such a light mist it was barely existent
customer_reviews.author: Wolfmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan! It’s a nice little chilly fan-when a hot flash takes me! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This fan sucks. Not a good purchase , it does not keep you cool and barely squirts any water or has room for water.
customer_reviews.author: carolanne

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan because I’m always hot lol, but mainly because I was going to a football game and it lasted the whole game!! It was a HOT day so I was really thankful to have it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great portable fan
customer_reviews.text: It operates much better than expected. Misting function was amazing. Like the ability to use it by AC, DC, or battery. Plan to use it in the GA airplane.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Williford

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great idea! No batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I use it more than I thought I would. I take it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Stonier

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: This fan is ok. The highest setting doesn’t blow all that hard. The misting feature is pretty weak as well. We bought another fan at the same time as this one and it did not have the misting feature, but it was much stronger and was collapsible so it helped during our trip to Disney in the middle of the Summer.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love Sat at a 2 hr graduation in 100 degrees, was very comfortable with the cool mist and air.
customer_reviews.author: Media 1221

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Used it in 115 degree in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I love it. Used it in 115 degree in the desert
customer_reviews.author: mandi makie

customer_reviews.title: Fun and useful.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. She takes it in her purse.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Q.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! We used these on an hot airplane ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! We used these on an hot airplane and in Hawaii on the beach! Love that they can be charged instead of batteries! High wind power and the most is a plus! My husband is always hot so these are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed using this product for the first time this past weekend. I gave it 4 stars only because I wish the water reservoir was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: weak misting, low power
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this fan. It really doesn't have much power and it doesn't mist much at all. I bought this to use at soccer games but whenI tried it indoors it didn't do much so it will be useless outdoors. I will be sending it back and searching for a better quality fan.
customer_reviews.author: pgco

customer_reviews.title: After halo laser care
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for after my halo x laser and it helped keep my face nice and cool
customer_reviews.author: erikka casper

customer_reviews.title: For a portable fan its a good price
customer_reviews.text: Fan battery lasts 2-3 hrs good life but misting feature wasn't that good barely sprayed any mist needs to have hole alittle bigger for more flow
customer_reviews.author: juan martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan, the battery lasts long. it kept me nice and cool flying on vacation
customer_reviews.author: william a laricci

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a Disney trip with kids during the summer. So glad I got it. Battery last long and the mist is great. Takes a while to charge so just plan ahead. Wish I bought more so we didn't have to fight over it.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Weak Mist
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for what it is. The fan is strong, but the mist barely blows out.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Family

customer_reviews.title: Keep Cool At The Beachp
customer_reviews.text: Fun product. Easy to use. Great on vacations to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Pops

customer_reviews.title: The idea is pretty good but the fan does not provide enough air
customer_reviews.text: The idea is pretty good but the fan does not provide enough air. You have to really keep it close to you. I use this primarily for golf (playing in Arizona heat). It does a fair job but could be a little more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: DEVINA WADHERA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, would have given it 5 stars if it blew a little harder.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's fine but not very powerful. You basically have to have it super close to feel the breeze.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Cute color too
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is legit. I use it at a super hot day at six flags and everyone I was with wanted that cool breeze I was getting lol
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Best thing EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS THING! I got it just to use for 1 day at a music festival and I ended up LOVING IT! It’s got a permanent spot in my purse lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE AND USEFUL
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my Hubby he works in construction. He said it was very handy and cools him down when needed. Easy to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Mr + Mrs Fortner

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient squirt bottle needed to fill reservoir for mist
customer_reviews.text: I didn't end up using this fan because it comes with a tiny squirt bottle you have to use to fill the water reservoir. Really? I'm supposed to carry that around as well? There is a strongly worded warning to only use the bottle because the fan is not waterproof and the reservoir is on the top above the motor so if you try to fill it from the tap...goodbye fan. Donated to charity.
customer_reviews.author: Hyacinth

customer_reviews.title: Water container had water droplets in it - returned.
customer_reviews.text: Returned because the water container had water residue in it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Worth it for the money spent, the rubber cap for the water broke on ours from being put in the book bag but other than that an excellent choice for a hot Disney vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing. Good amount of air output when turn up the speed. The water reservoir is something can be improved by making it larger reservoir. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald l.

customer_reviews.title: Dead after a month
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The mister stopped working after a month.
customer_reviews.author: BtopTov123

product_meta.title: OPOLAR Handheld Personal Water Misting Fan for Travel, Portable Rechargeable Fan with 2200mAh Battery, Battery Operated or USB Powered, Small Air Cooler/Mini Humidifier with 3 Settings
feature_bullets: 💧★RECHARGEABLE & PORTABLE FAN★ With built-in rechargeable 2200mAh lithium battery, light-weight and handle design, mini size (4 inch) convenient to carry with when go hiking and travel.
💧★HUMIDIFIER AND COOLING Fan★ USB mini cooling fan and beauty humidifier 2 in 1, hand misty fan for lasting your makeup or cooling after exercise.

💧★3 SPEEDS AND TWO MODES SPRAYING★ 3 Modes of Wind Speed-Low, medium, or high. Continuous or intermittent spraying per your choice, the humidifier could operate independently or together with the fan.
💧★USB OR BATTERY OPERATED★ Upgraded 2200mAh rechargeable battery (included) or by being connected with a USB cable (included). Battery works 2-6 hours for a fully charge (Depend on the mode you use)
💧★LOW NOISE★ Adopting brushless motor can reduce noise to 40db. Just a whisper on high and silent on low. You cannot hear it over the sound of typing.
